who.title: Who We Are
who.description: We are a team committed to empowering learners through technology and accessible education.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To spark confidence, creativity, and curiosity in every child by giving them the tools, exposure, and inspiration to dream boldly and learn with purpose.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A future where every child grows up feeling seen, supported, and excited about who they are becoming and parents are right there beside them on the journey.
